abstract: A preview Wednesday's games, Matchday 3, of the UEFA Champions League.
snippet: A preview Wednesday's games, Matchday 3, of the UEFA Champions League.
lead_paragraph: Don't look now, but as the Champions League's group stage comes its halfway point with eight games on Wednesday, the pride of Cyprus leads Group G. APOEL (Athlitikos Podosfairikos Omilos Ellinon Lefkosias in Greek, or Athletic Football Club of Greeks of Nicosia) goes to Portugal to face Porto leading the group by a point.

headline.main: Champions League Wednesday Preview: Porto Leery of APOEL
